sentence.Network_en: He is confined to his hourse with a cold.
The hourse is still nice to look at.
sentence.Network_cn: 这匹马看上去还是挺棒的.

sentence.Network_en: Teng was very sad. But he knew he had to prepare for the pommel hourse.
sentence.Network_cn: 螣很沮丧, 但是他知道自己还要准备参加鞍马的比赛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He is confined to his hourse with a cold ., 他因感冒而呆在家里.

list.abs: Teng was very sad . but he knew he had to prepare for the pommel hourse .螣很沮丧，但是他知道自己还要准备参加鞍马的比赛。
还有就是 in the hourse不是在建筑里面,只样的解释似乎,有点.. 说不过去
